summary.name: Ecosia
summary.description: Ecosia is a CO2-neutral search engine that donates 80% of its surplus income to tree planting programs, bringing water, plants, and animals back to drought-ridden areas. It offers a free browser extension. The company has 52 employees.

overview.name: Tree Planting Location
overview.description: Tree planting in the method of nurseries occurs here in July and August. There are 7 planting locations that are identified but not specified.

overview.name: Headquarteres and admin offices
overview.description: Inside a former chocolate factory, Ecosia runs its multi million dollar search engine company with environmentally friendly goals. Here, the team works on their mission. (https://theorg. com/org/ecosia/team) This team works to continue to improve their search engine function and research more sustainable practices. It is there only office.
